title: WATCH REWARDS ARE CORRECTLY SET UP FOR YOUR ACCOUNT   can not get the rewards
body: i have watched so many video and check out so many links from EU but no one actually figure out a way to solve the problem, riot fix the bug

replies.body:
Have you tried a different browser?

Have you tried a different stream (youtube/twitch)?

Have you submitted a ticket to player support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)?
